articles.title: Three foreigners arrested for working illegally as delivery riders
articles.summary:
📰 제목: 불법으로 배달 업무 종사한 외국인 3명 체포

내용: 싱가포르 노동부(MOM)가 배달 업무를 단속한 결과, 375명의 배달 근로자들이 점검되었으며 이 중 3명의 외국인이 불법으로 일하다 체포되었다. 이들은 조사 중이다.
articles.content: His post included a video of the checks being conducted. Around 375 delivery workers were checked during MOM's operations. Three foreigners were arrested and are under investigation for allegedly working illegally as delivery riders

articles.title: Beyond chow mein: Can a new wave of restaurants help China win hearts?
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르, 취업, 음식 관련 뉴스
📢 Beyond chow mein: Can a new wave of restaurants help China win hearts?
articles.content: All of this on a walk down Liang Seah Street in Singapore. Chinese food is having a moment outside China, driven by huge success and intense competition back home. And nowhere is this clearer than in Singapore, where ethnically Chinese people make up more than three-quarters of the multicultural population. And yet, as an increasingly authoritarian China tries hard to win the world over, a...

articles.title: In cramped, sweaty Hong Kong, climate change is making things worse for the poorest
articles.summary:
📰 교육, 환경 관련 뉴스
📢 In cramped, sweaty Hong Kong, climate change is making things worse for the poor...
articles.content: On a sweltering summer afternoon in Hong Kong, Yeung Fong-yan’s flat felt like an oven. Her 13-year-old grandson had just returned home from school, exhausted and drenched in sweat after climbing nine floors to reach their apartment
